CT Vision 1
  • CT Vision
    • 1

The Vision Photo Tag object is intended for the connection between Tag and Vision Photo objectshttps://help.customertimes.com/smart/project-ct-vision-lite-en/adding-photo-tags-2-9[].

Object API Name: ctvVisionPhotoTagc

The following fields must be created on the Vision Photo Tag object:

Field API Name Type Description

Vision Photo

ctvVisionPhotoc

Master-Detail(Vision Photo)

Specify the Vision Photo record.

Tag

ctvTagc

Master-Detail(Tag)

Specify the Tag record.
